Keeping Up with the COVID-19 Epidemic

Welcome to joelhay.com. I am a PhD Health Economist whose mission is to generate and share reliable and transparent evidence on the impact of the COVID-19 epidemic, and to critically examine the institutional policies made in response to the epidemic around the globe.
To take our survey navigate to the SURVEY tab below
